org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 StripeStoreFlusher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StripeStoreFlusher

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class StripeStoreFlusher
extends Object
    Stripe implementation of StoreFlusher. Flushes files either into L0 file w/o metadata, or into separate striped files, avoiding L0.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  StripeStoreFlusher.BoundaryStripeFlushRequest
      Stripe flush request wrapper based on boundaries.
      static class  StripeStoreFlusher.SizeStripeFlushRequest
      Stripe flush request wrapper based on size.
      static class  StripeStoreFlusher.StripeFlushRequest
      Stripe flush request wrapper that writes a non-striped file.

        public StripeStoreFlusher(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,

    • 方法详细资料

      • flushSnapshot

        public List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> flushSnapshot(MemStoreSnapshot snapshot,
                                                     long cacheFlushSeqNum,
                                                     org.apache.hadoop.hbase.monitoring.MonitoredTask status,
                                                     ThroughputController throughputController,
                                                     FlushLifeCycleTracker tracker)
                                              throws IOException
        Turns a snapshot of memstore into a set of store files.
        参数:
        snapshot - Memstore snapshot.
        cacheFlushSeqNum - Log cache flush sequence number.
        status - Task that represents the flush operation and may be updated with status.
        throughputController - A controller to avoid flush too fast
        返回:
        List of files written. Can be empty; must not be null.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • finalizeWriter

        protected void finalizeWriter(StoreFileWriter writer,
                              long cacheFlushSeqNum,
                              org.apache.hadoop.hbase.monitoring.MonitoredTask status)
                       throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createScanner

        protected final InternalScanner createScanner(List<KeyValueScanner> snapshotScanners,
                                              long smallestReadPoint,
                                              FlushLifeCycleTracker tracker)
                                       throws IOException
        Creates the scanner for flushing snapshot. Also calls coprocessors.
        参数:
        snapshotScanners -
        smallestReadPoint -
        返回:
        The scanner; null if coprocessor is canceling the flush.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • performFlush

        protected void performFlush(InternalScanner scanner,
                            CellSink sink,
                            long smallestReadPoint,
                            ThroughputController throughputController)
                     throws IOException
        Performs memstore flush, writing data from scanner into sink.
        参数:
        scanner - Scanner to get data from.
        sink - Sink to write data to. Could be StoreFile.Writer.
        smallestReadPoint - Smallest read point used for the flush.
        throughputController - A controller to avoid flush too fast
        抛出:
        IOException
